title: Another "Ezreal" ?!?
body:
Okay, with the new expansions of the world "League of Legends" is set in. The City of Progress: Piltover was recently added, with Bios of the Champions based there.

Okay to the point now.
I was reading the Ezreal bio (cause like i love {{champion:81}} as a champ but can't play him LOL) and it quoted- :Unbeknownst to him, the glove had a twin that had been excavated from the tomb years before."

SO!!!! Who or What took the gauntlet all those years ago? Who or WHat has it now? and where is it? And will there be a new champ that will be {{champion:81}}'s rival!??!?!?

replies.body:
Lol

A STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN? 

LEAGUE OF LEGENDS X OVERWATCH!!!!!
Taric likes to wear the glove during Taric time
His parents wouldn't it be? Most likely his father as it being back in those times.

but supposedly his parents perished and he was able to find it because it also quotes  "Worse, Ezreal could not help but feel that if his parents were still alive, he would not have found the gauntlet at all."

> [{quoted}](name=NeoRouge,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WtKOAmhl,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-12-11T09:34:25.078+0000)
>
> but supposedly his parents perished and he was able to find it because it also quotes  "Worse, Ezreal could not help but feel that if his parents were still alive, he would not have found the gauntlet at all."

True, I only scammed through the text to get a general gist about it so you're probably right. Sorry I can't help you anymore. Wish I could.
Maybe it was another explorer and it now belongs in a museum
that would be so bad TBH, like such a bland ending lol{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
